About the Company: Regal entertainment & consultants ltd company is engaged in broad based finance and investment activities like investment, trading in shares and securities, corporate debt syndication, public issue management,etc.The company had set up Mumbais first ICE SKATING RINK named ARCTIC CIRCLE at ESSELWORLD, Gorai, Mumbai on BOT (Built operate and Transfer) basis with Pan India Paryatan Limited(Esselworld).The companys shares are listed at Bombay Stock Exchange, Mumbai and Madras Stock Exchange.
